dict.acceptation: 作注释；作注解；作解释；作评语；

sent.orig: Cisco was not available for comment. A Nokia spokeswoman in Helsinki declined to comment.
sent.trans: 思科没能立即对此做出评论，诺基亚的发言人拒绝对此发表评论。

sent.orig: Signaling at zero G: a comment. [comment].
AIA declined to comment. Mr Roder and Mr Cashin could not be reached for comment.
sent.trans: AIA拒绝置评。记者未能联系到罗德与凯辛置评。

sent.orig: The xsl:comment> element is used to create a comment node in the result tree.
sent.trans: 元素的作用是：在结果树中创建一个注释节点。

sent.orig: Radiation dose measurement and optimization. [see comment][comment].
